password-mismatch: Your new password does not match the confirmation password
permission-required: You do not have permission to access the requested route.
profile-activating: Please hold on while we activate your profile.
profile-activated: Your profile has been successfully activated.
profile-activation-failed: Your profile could not be activated: {0}
title: Title
token-login-working: Please hang on a while the system logs you in.
token-login-successful: You have been successfully logged in.
token-login-failed: You could not be logged in.  Please try again.
user-required: No users have been registered.  You will be registered as an administrator.

exceptions.access-failure: Could not initialize the `shuttle-access` module.  The back-end may not be available.

messages.already-registered: The e-mail address '{email}' is already registered.
messages.register-request-sent: The request to register e-mail address '{email}' has been submitted.  Please give it a moment to complete and then check your e-mail and keep an eye on your junk/spam folder just in case.
messages.forgot-password: We will send you an e-mail containing a link that you can click to reset your password.
messages.no-items: There are no items to display.
messages.oauth-email-not-found: No e-mail address was returned from the OAuth provider.  Please try again.
messages.email-not-registered: The e-mail address '{email}' associated with the OAuth provider is not registered.
messages.password-reset-sent: The e-mail with the password reset link has been sent.  Please check your e-mail and keep an eye on your junk/spam folder just in case.
messages.request-sent: The request has been submitted.  It may take a moment to process.
